data.title: Anatole France The Mind and The Man.
data.meta_description: Anatole France the Mind and the Man. - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The first version of this book was a purely psychological biography of Anatole France. By the irony of fate the little volume that had gone out of print was rescued from oblivion. Despite much pruning, the revised edition grew into a longer biography.
data.text: Anatole France The Mind and The Man.
